entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Fort Qu'Appelle
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:39 AM CST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: -15.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Indian Head AAFC 05:00 AM CST Sunday 25 December 2022
Temperature: -15.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.2 kPa falling
Humidity: 84 %
Wind Chill: -29
Dewpoint: -17.4°C
Wind: SSE 48 km/h gust 57 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday: Snow and blowing snow. High minus 12 with temperature falling to minus 17 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Snow ending near noon then cloudy. Blowing snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming northwest 40 gusting to 60 this morning. High minus 12 with temperature falling to minus 17 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 23 this morning and minus 28 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 23.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 23. Wind chill minus 24 this evening and minus 31 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Monday: Mainly cloudy. High minus 8.
